name: Ach!  It's Willie! Trivia Game | Simpsons | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
North Kilt-Town.

	This tidbit of information was released as Homer and Bart entered the school cafeteria to steal grease.  Apparently, North Kilt-Town is next to the Loch Ness Monster's lake as shown in the episode "Monty Can't Buy Me Love."

questions.text: What song does Willie sing when he auditions for "The Be Sharps?"
questions.explanation:
Downtown.

	"...You can always go, doontoon!"  The Be Sharps consisted of Homer, Apu, and Principal Skinner.  They were holding auditions for a replacement for Chief Wiggum who was kicked out of the group.  They later replaced him with Barney Gumble.

questions.text: What animal that escaped from Krustylu Studios did Willie battle with in the school halls?
questions.explanation:
Alaskan Timber Wolf.

	The Alaskan Timber Wolf originally left Krustylu Studios because Krusty and his audience screamed at the secret word of the day (which was "loud").  The word was triggered by the wolf's trainer who said that the Alaskan timber wolf is afraid of loud noises.

questions.text: What animal does Willie chase through the ventilation shafts of Springfield Elementary School?
questions.explanation:
A dog.

	Willie chases Santa's Little Helper through the shafts.  Santa's Little Helper got loose when Bart shut him into a closet after using him for Show and Tell.  In the end, Principal Skinner lost his job.

questions.text: In which Halloween short does Willie become the groundskeeper of a mountain hotel?
questions.explanation:
The Shinning.

	In "Treehouse of Horror V," Willie tends to the hedge maze until he tells Bart that he has "the shinning."  He eventually gets stabbed in the back with an axe.

questions.text: Willie ends Homers long harassment mix-up with a tape proving his innocence.  Who else do we see on the tape?
questions.explanation:
Mayor Quimby.

	Willie ends Homers mix-up while he was filming "amateur videos" in a tree.  Homer was a so-called sexual harasser because he pulled a "Gummi Venus De Milo" off of a babysitter's butt as she left the car.

questions.text: How does Groundskeeper Willie strike oil in the school?
questions.explanation:
He buries a dead hamster.

	When the school's hamster dies over spring break, Principal Skinner tells Willie to bury it.  He strikes oil and Mr. Burns steals it.  This event works up to the "Who Shot Mr. Burns" plot.

questions.text: How does Willie die in the Halloween short "Nightmare on Evergreen Terrace?"
options: He gets an axe to the back
questions.explanation:
He burns to death.

	The parents of Springfield go to the school to discuss misprinted calendars, and Homer turns up the heater in the school causing the furnace to set Willie on fire.

questions.text: Who voices Groundskeeper Willie on "The Simpsons?"
questions.explanation:
Dan Castellaneta.

	Dan Castellaneta also plays the voices of Homer, Barney, Grandpa, Krusty, Sideshow Mel, etc.

questions.text: Which is not true about Groundskeeper Willie?
options: He made millions in software, but lost it all at the track
He taught French at Springfield Elementary
He was a member of "The Stonecutters"
questions.explanation:
He married Shary Bobbins.

	He used to be engaged to Shary Bobbins, but then her eyesight came back.  Everything else listed about Willie is true.
